MessageJP: おお、いたか。うむ、何から話したものか……
MessageTW: 哦哦，你在呀。唔呣，該從哪說起好呢……
MessageEN: Hmm. How should I put this...

MessageJP: 電算局のミスのせいで、ちょっと面倒なことになったのだ
MessageTW: 因為電算局的失誤，發生了一點麻煩……
MessageEN: There's been, shall I say, a slight complication, due to a misstep, perpetrated by the Computer Science Bureau...

MessageJP: 本来なら規定通りに全員粛清すべきだが
MessageTW: 雖然本來應該依照規定肅清所有人的
MessageEN: As stated in the rules, of course, all of their members should be purged.

MessageJP: 結果的にレッドウィンターの財政に役立ったからな
MessageTW: 但從結果上來說，對赤冬學園的經濟狀況有了幫助
MessageEN: However, in consideration of certain remarks that Tomoe made, as well as the fact that said complication ultimately became a financial boon to Red Winter Academy...

MessageJP: トモエの助言もあって、今回だけは処分を免除することにしてやったんだ
MessageTW: 加上智惠也替他們求情，所以這次就免除了他們的處分
MessageEN: It's been decided that an exception will be made, and they'll be put on probation instead.

MessageJP: いまいち話が掴めてないんだけど……
MessageEN: Now I really have no clue what you're talking about...

MessageJP: とりあえず、おいらの温泉郷に来てくれ！
MessageTW: 總之，到咱在的溫泉浴場來吧！
MessageEN: Just come join me at the hot springs resort.
Perhaps it will be easier for you to see for yourself, since explaining isn't working.

MessageJP: チェリノ（温泉）の絆イベントへ
MessageTW: 前往潔莉諾(溫泉)的羈絆劇情
